archimate:DataObject.name: CommunicationInteractionUseCase
archimate:DataObject.documentation: A CommunicationInteractionUseCase specifies which entity (RootEntity) is concerned and which action (CommunicationInteractionAction) are concerned by the CommunicationInteractionItem. For example: - Action: buy for Entity: ProductOffering PO1 - Action: ask for recovery for Entity: Billys Broadband - Action: notify Entity: Billys Customer Bill
